  1. The problem with "100vw" CSS unit 👇 - When vertical scrollbars are present, majority of browsers include the scrollbar width in "100vw" which in turn introduces an overflow of content horizontally, resulting in a horizontal scrolling bar. How to fix this 👇 #css
    On twitter.com ♻️ 1 Retweets ❤️ 2 Favorites 2022 May 29 Mood 0
    1. …in reply to @murtuza_surti
      There is no solid solution to this, just some fixes that you can do! - codepen.io/bassplayer7/pen/egZKpm - jaketrent.com/post/100vw-not-scrollbar-aware These two resources provide you with a fix!
